INSERT INTO Class (id, name, semestr, years, count_of_labs, count_of_lects, control_type) VALUES (@Id, @Name, @Semestr, @Years, @CountOfLabs, @CountOfLects, @ControlType)
update Class set name = @Name, semestr = @Semestr, years = @Years, count_of_labs = @CountOfLabs, count_of_lects = @CountOfLects, control_type = @ControlType where id = @Id
